tool_description: The Chinese Pinyin Conversion API allows you to seamlessly convert Chinese characters into their respective Pinyin representations. Whether you need standard Pinyin, Pinyin with tones, or just the initials, this API provides accurate and efficient conversions. Perfect for applications, language tools, and educational resources aiming to enhance Chinese language processing. Experience the ease of integrating Pinyin conversion capabilities into your projects with this reliable and user-friendly...
name: Chinese Pinyin Conversion API
title: Chinese Pinyin Conversion API

api_list.name: /ping
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chinese-pinyin-conversion-api.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chinese-pinyin-conversion-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())
